basics.name: Harry Thomasian
basics.label: Aspiring Software Developer
basics.summary: I have always been facinated with technology and its ability to solve problems in new ways. Throughout my formal education I have worked with many different technologies but found I am most interested in web based technology and mobile applications. I continue to pursue knowledge and experience in both these areas and hope to soon enter the workforce as a software developer after I graduate in December.

highlights: Work with a Microsoft tech stack (C#, ASP.NET, IIS, TFS) to maintain legacy applications that are deployed worldwide
Develop in-house software using web technologies such as React and Node.js
Regularly interact with senior management and developers to receive feedback and gather requirements
Participate in Agile team and utilize TFS to manage source control and bi-weekly sprints
Built GUI Java application with JavaFX interfaced with a MySQL database that allows program administrators to edit, add, search and maintain student data
Worked with database architect and design team to build application and database from the ground up
Maintained and updated application based on proactive communications with program administrators
Developed weather application built natively for android devices in Android Studio
Utilized threading, recycler view, fragments, databases, intents, location services, and a REST API.
Constructed unit tests with Mockito and functional tests with Espresso
Developed simple bitcoin wallet built natively for android devices using the BitcoinJ library
Participated in Agile development environment as a Part-time Scrum Master
Worked with team to design application, create advertising material, and build user documentation
